title: Bookjacket Design, "Book cover for the NRF (Nouvelle Revue Français by Justin O'Brien", ca. 1958
medium: Lithography in black, red, yellow, and grey ink on white wove paper
inscribed:
Imprinted vertically at lower left edge in yellow ink: Elaine Lustig
Across the center in black and red ink: From the / NRF
At upper right in red ink: Essays from the/ Nouvelle Revue Française/ edited, selected and introduced by/ (in black ink) Justin O'Brien
creditline: Gift of Tamar Cohen and Dave Slatoff
description: Book cover for the NRF. The cover has a light yellow background with a darker yellow band running from top to bottom on the right side and a grey band from left to right across the bottom. In the grey band are 9 rows of names, probably authors of essays.

tombstone.epitaph:
Bookjacket Design, "Book cover for the NRF (Nouvelle Revue Français by Justin O'Brien", ca. 1958.
ca. 1958. Lithography in black, red, yellow, and grey ink on white wove paper. Gift of Tamar Cohen and Dave Slatoff. 1993-31-56.
